message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $15,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am proposing to sell this product to you for $12,000. This offer allows you to secure an item that is well within your valuation range while also ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your positive response.
